website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for the kids' bathroom. No-fuss design is easy to wipe clean. A push of the button dispenses a preset amount of fluid, so no more waste or overuse of hair products.
pros: Easy installation with included double-sided tape and silicone glue
cons: Single chamber is not as voluminous as other dispensers reviewed here

customer_reviews.title: Shattered to pieces spraying soap everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The silicone included in this kit did not bind to the plastic of the dispenser. I used the whole tube and the double sided stickers, cleaning the surfaces as directed then letting it cure for over 24 hours. Within 48 hours of putting soap in it took a dive bomb and exploded 3 full amounts of soap and shatters the plastic holders. The silicone and tape is still stuck to the wall and needs to be razor blades off but not a spec of it was on the Despenser. Buyer beware and buy your own bonding agent!!
customer_reviews.author: Just1188

customer_reviews.title: Still fell and broke just like the picture posted from other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Double sided tape does not hold this heavy item, even heavier when shampoo and conditioner inside and it fell and broke. Ive had my other one for 12 years - this is cheap and the double tape and silicone does not hold. If you are going to use it,I strongly suggest filling up half way and not fill it up, because it gets heavy to hold - I even waited 3 days before filling up. Still fell and broke just like the picture posted from other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but easy to accidentally dislodge and break the canisters
customer_reviews.text: I use Bronners soap and purchased two of these to dispense a variety of flavors. Unfortunately, the canisters do not mount securely, so they can easily slide out and fall and break just by pressing the button to dispense soap. My wife thought I was reckless until she had the same thing happen to her with a second canister. I have tried to contact support and received no response. I really wanted to like this product. It is overpriced for the cheaply constructed plastic body, but does do the job nicely... except this major design flaw really spoils it. I regret spending this money and strongly advise against buying this product
customer_reviews.author: D. Berzack

customer_reviews.title: Installed with Command Strips.  See photos.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install using two small/medium command strips. I plan on moving this to our RV shower wall in the spring and wanted it installed temporary in our house. The pumps are easy to prime and they really help at minimizing soap usage. Small tip: If using a thick substance like conditioner or lotion, an air pocket may form if you use many pumps at once. I would normally tap my conditioner bottle to continue to dispense, but that's not practical with a wall mounted fixture. We find that keeping the container at least half full helps eliminated this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: 1. The adhesive does not work. I followed the instructions and all it did was slide down the wall. 2. The adhesive smells like rotten eggs and it took forever to get rid of the smell. 3. The lids on the containers don’t stay on. There’s nothing to hold them on. They just sit on top. Overall I would never suggest this to anyone. However, if you do end up buying it and it doesn’t stick to the tile like it didn’t for me, if you want to save them try suction hooks. That’s what I used and it’s holding up. The ones that you have to pull out straight then pull them down to get a good suction.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: with water it works fine but as soon as I put in shower gel
customer_reviews.text: twice I have filled one of the three containers to make sure that the liquid will not dribble out. with water it works fine but as soon as I put in shower gel, it leaks it all over the floor...I have wasted a whole bottle of my shower gel...I should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Salish

customer_reviews.title: Won't dispense anything thicker than water.
customer_reviews.text: This item looks nice, and adhered very well to the wall. I know this because I chiseled it off the wall to return it. The problem with these is that they won't dispense anything with thicker viscosity than water! It's not really a pump system either; these are purely by gravity, as the button opens a pinhole chamber for the contents to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMan

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It!
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser adheres well, and is strong. Make sure you follow ALL of the directions EXACTLY as they are stated! This is my second time ordering this, with this one being newer model than the previous one, and I have not been disappointed. I will be ordering three more for my other bathrooms. I prefer a clean, clutter free shower and this does the trick! Oh, the one I bought before this one is STILL up and holding strong! No issues! I moved and knew I needed get more.
customer_reviews.author: ~MINNIE~

customer_reviews.title: Would not re-purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept, but it has a couple of issues. If you accidentally push up while pumping(really easy to do) the container falls out of its mount. Not that easy to clean. If a shampoo or body wash has been in there for a little while it takes a bit of coaxing to get it out. I recommend a toothbrush or bottle brush to get the bottom gunk out. I am constantly hitting the top silver lids with my elbows because I have a small shower and they just fall right off. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: The first one came broken, but they replaced it without any hassle. It was actually kind of hard to install. The surface was smooth, fully dried and cleaned with rubbing alcohol beforehand. The gel wouldn’t harden fast enough so I had to hold it in place, by hand, for almost 20 minutes. Despite that, it won’t come off! It’s fully waterproof and dispenses just fine. It’s been up for about a month with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Fierstos

customer_reviews.title: Crashed to the Floor. Poor Stickiness!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for a little while, until it fell off my wall and crashed to the floor as I was sleeping. I truly thought that it was a burglar in my house, so I grabbed the gun that I keep next to my bed and try to identify where the problem came from. I heard nothing more and I checked around my place, but only discovered shattered pieces of this Aviva shampoo, conditioner, and body wash dispenser at the floor of my shower. It appears that the permanent sticky backing which accompanied the package came loose causing this thing to crash down.
customer_reviews.author: AdioKing

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek and works great even for thick gels
customer_reviews.text: These amazing dispensers will work even for the thickest conditioner. Just follow the "priming" instructions. Even though they are plastic, they look like satin nickel and the quality seems great. I mounted them inside our recessed shower and bath cubbies. I can easily dispense the liquids and also remove the bottles. Easy to fill though the large top hole. Looks very sleek, so I got one for each bathroom. I filled them with shower gel, shampoo and conditioner. All are white and it looks cool. After dealing with rusting "satin nickel" containers sitting inside the cubbies, these mounted ones are a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Picky gal

customer_reviews.title: Barely adequate, poor pumps, poor retention
customer_reviews.text: Won't dispense any soaps at full strength. They must be watered down to pump appropriately. Also, no positive locking tab to retain these on the wall bracket means that even a slight upward bump and they will fall off and shatter. Will definitely not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I have Purchased 17 of these. Best I've found!
customer_reviews.text: My company has purchased a total of 17 of these dispensers and have at least 7 more on the way. WE have had them in use for about 18 months and they work great! The double sides tape and the silicone has stuck to the shower wall (tile, plastic & glass) for over 18 months and has not fallen! The only time we have had trouble with these chambers breaking is when they were installed too close the front of the shower. We found that putting them towards the back solved the problem. I have purchased other brands and they DO NOT hold up nearly as well or long as these.
customer_reviews.author: Gamyr W

customer_reviews.title: Shower dispenser
customer_reviews.text: So I love that this allows you to get rid of the bottle in the shower. Looks pretty good and came with command strips and a special glue. Sturdiness seems pretty good! My problem with the unit is that if you use thicker products, it will not dispense them. I use Pantene for hair and Dove for body wash and those products were too thick. I had to dilute the conditioner and body wash with water, after priming the pumps and diluting the products slightly it works and pumps the products effortlessly. All in all I would still recommend this. It works, it looks good, and it’s affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Berge

customer_reviews.title: Reservoirs on the small side. Shampoo and conditioner too thick to dispense
customer_reviews.text: Disapointed with the small reservoirs. Have to constantly refill. Then, even after "priming" I could not dispense any product. I ended up dilluting both the shampoo and the conditioner with plain water and then it worked just fine. I would still recommend converting to a dispenser like this especially if you have an airbnb as it is much better for the environment over the tiny size shampoo and conditioners. Just try to find a shampoo and conditioner that will dispense without having to dilute. I had no trouble with the install.
customer_reviews.author: MEPchll

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking organizer and helpful for osteoarthritis hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my bathroom and help my osteoarthritis hands which I can't squeeze hard plastic bottles with. I had hard time opening the cap of shampoo and conditioner every day. I fill the unit with shampoo, conditioner and shower gel, and use this daily. It's much easier for my hands. The pumps have lifetime warranty. Installation was easy after reading the instructions and contacting the manufacturer for missing adhesive tape. The instructions showed 3 tapes, but there was only 2 tapes. They sent me the additional tape fast. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely top notch!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something to replace individual dispensers for shampoo, conditioner and liquid shower soap, and this was the perfect find. I was a bit concerned that there might be a problem dispensing the somewhat thick conditioner I use, but there was no problem at all. This unit is very nice looking, installed easily per the included instructions and adhesive, and works perfectly. I like the fact that I can see the amount of product remaining in each dispenser, plus the fact that each one just lifts out of the mounting rack for easy cleaning and refilling. I would rate this one an A++++++ and am just so glad I found it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: BillieBobRob

customer_reviews.title: I really like this unit, it works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a couple of weeks ago, and after reading all of the one star reviews, I have to assume the users did not use the supplied silicone adhesive, and trusted the 2 supplied 1" sq only pieces of double stick tape, not smart! I did listen to the reviewer who used Gorilla Brand "Double Stick" tape! Me too, I also used the tube of silicon, guess what, the Dispenser is attached to my shower wall, hanging nicely, the priming of the pumps was a snap, I really like this unit, it works very well!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Better than most but still not great
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser is nice looking and fairly easy to install, although they don't provide the amount of stickies the instructions suggest I was able to install. The conditioner dispenser is a pain to get working. I purchased two dispensers and both conditioner dispensers required replacement. The caps for the dispensers don't come off in a natural way, so they always wind up on the floor or inside the bottle of whatever I am refilling at the time, which is a pain in the neck. The caps should come off as a flip cap or have a hinge... I like the product but I'm looking forward to something better.
customer_reviews.author: Marthika

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2016 and it’s still like new!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this dispenser in 2016 and for the last year I’ve told myself to write a review. We’ve had no problems at all with the dispenser and it looks like the first day we installed it in the shower. Durable YES, I’ve dropped one of the containers TWICE, and it survived. This is a must have a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great! Easy to Install! No more clutter!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased both the 3 chamber and 2 chamber Chrome Better Living AVIVA Chamber Dispensers! Easy to install. Easy to open and refill. You do have to push the pump button a few times (like 20+) to prime it before the liquid will come out of the dispenser for the first time, which it clearly states for you to do on the instructions. After that it’s golden! Love these products!
customer_reviews.author: MrsBaylocks

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Convenient, but with delicate elements
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is shiny chrome plated, easy to install, and looks very nice in my shower. It eliminated at least three soap, shampoo, and or conditioner bottles, tidying the overall space. This is the third one I've installed. I gave it four stars because the dispensers are easy to dislodge accidentally and the plastic tabs that hold the containers to the mount break easily if hit in just the right spot. This set was ordered to replace one of the dispensers I broke.
customer_reviews.author: Free Nibor

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review / Rating - Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: When I installed it and filled it with products nothing was coming out of the conditioner dispenser but the other two were working fine. After two days the conditioner dispenser is working too. Maybe the texture of the conditioner and the fact that it wasn't touching the bottom? Not sure? but with all the 3 dispensers working now I am happy :) OLD Review Below: (Conditioner chamber not working Shampoo and Body wash is working (..so Far) conditioner not working. Is there a way to just replace that chamber? I do not want to waste the products I've already poured into the other chambers.)
customer_reviews.author: mariwan

customer_reviews.title: Almost broke my neck.
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser worked well for a few days and then I almost broke my neck. I stepped into the shower one morning and there was almost an entire bottle of leaked shampoo on the floor. It leaked out during the night. So I took the thing apart and fiddled with it, thinking I might have fixed the leaky valve. Filled it. Leaked again. Couldn't find out how to contact the seller, so....back to square one, minus $40 and two bottles of shampoo (but at least I didn't fall in the shower).
customer_reviews.author: boomerang

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Stays in place but read instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order because of the reviews of it falling. I took the risk and am very happy I did. To make this more secure I used the included adhesive tape and silicone on the back. I then applied the left over silicone to the top and side edges and waited 2 days to fill dispensers to ensure a solid adhesion. It worked like a charm. The dispenser is solidly mounted to my shower wall. I am ordering additional units for our 3 other showers.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon Fizer

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars. Cheap, flimsy, won’t pump liquid out.
customer_reviews.text: I have pumped these over 600 times EACH and still nothing will come out. It’s not thick. But it will. Not. Come. Out. We had to get our own mounting because we weren’t putting silicon glue on our bath. Horrible product and horrifically overpriced for the plastic it’s made of.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Foster

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Soap Chambers
customer_reviews.text: It came with a clip broken off of one chamber. I received a new unit but was never asked to return the broken one so I tossed it. Now I'm being charged twice. This is just bad customer service. And if you accidentally bump this unit, one or two of the chambers are going to pop out of the mounting bracket and break into several pieces on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Temkin

customer_reviews.title: I like the product... But
customer_reviews.text: I love these pumps and use them for my rentals. I have had issues with a few of them though. Unfortunately, after a while they leak onto the tub below. A seal inside fails after sometime. I end up with a soap mess all over the tub. I've also had one of the pumps break. A small plastic piece that holds the pumps together snapped. I still like the product, but I can't give it a great review and they need some work.
customer_reviews.author: Aus

customer_reviews.title: Check Silicone Glue Before You Begin Installation
customer_reviews.text: Functional, attractive, and easy to install. Having purchased six of these previously (for the Travel Trailer), with no problems, I decided to get two more for the home shower. Unfortunately, one of the tubes of silicone glue had solidified. Need to check these tubes before beginning installation so Item can be returned. In my case, I had discarded the packaging and affixed the double-sided tape before discovering the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sagittaire

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: These look great. First I purchased the three chamber for the shower and it looks great. I've had it up for a month now and its holding on strong. I then purchased the single chamber for the half bath since I don't have much space in the sink area. Both are holding on strong. No issues. It was easy to install ... no tools necessary. But I do suggest that you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to use all over house.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Took a while for me to get the conditioner dispensing. Had to just keep pumping to build pressure. I used my finger to plug the hole and just kept pumping till I heard the squish sound and that's when it finally dispensed. The Shampoo, body wash, dishsoap. And handsoap were very easy though. I have been using for about a month now with no issues. I chose to mount mine to the wall with screws, so that I wouldn't have to deal with any falling messes just in case. Highly recommend, especially for dishsoap.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nearly 6 Years Later
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2014. The pictures here are from Dec 2019. Just look how great the held up. If I had tried to clean them better before I took a picture, you'd probably thought they were new. They get used daily for the past 5+ years. If you want liquid dispensers, these are your go to. If I remember correctly priming them was a bit of a pain in the ass, but as long as you keep them filled...it's really a none issue. Install was stupid easy with the provided adhesive(s)
customer_reviews.author: Soljia

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the competition!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of others that had no discernible brand name, and they only released a drop or two per button push. They were easy to mount and looked fine, but it's a pain to push the button 15 times to get barely enough shampoo. That eliminates the convenience factor, which is the entire purpose of this! I used an AVIVA one in the shower on a Carnival cruise ship (they would only buy high-quality, durable ones), and immediately bought this. It's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: DenverDave

customer_reviews.title: Good product with one drawback
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and convenience of these soap dispensers. They're easy to assemble, fill/refill and it frees up counter space. My biggest issue is that it's easy for a user to accidentally bump the dispenser and unlatch it from the holder. Since the lid is not tight, soap spills everywhere. If you've ever cleaned up a soap spill, you know it's not easy. This has happened twice and we've had to clean up a huge mess and refill the entire container of soap. I suppose we could duct tape the lid, but that's not very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent shower soap dispenser, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent shower soap dispenser, but not great. It is VERY difficult to prime, especially with thick liquids like conditioner on a cold day. The trick is to depress the pump button, THEN put your finger over the bottom hole where the liquid comes out and release the pump button. This forces the pump to pull fluid in from the storage chamber. Also, it does not dispense very much liquid with each pump so it takes several pumps to get enough. This pump is NOT battery powered which may be good or bad. It does have great feedback, but I'm learning the high scoring feedback is sometimes not true.
customer_reviews.author: vito

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: Works well and holds a lot of product. Ended up getting a second one after using the first for several months and having to fight over it. Each pump puts out a moderate to small amount of product. I typically use 3 or 4 pumps of body wash a day. This is about perfect for having face cleaner and body soap in the same style of dispenser. The assembly is definitely plastic but doesn't feel too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hinnen

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are so many untrue reviews. I bought this shampoo dispenser because I saw a lot of good reviews, and the reviews that sold me was that some reviews mentioned that this works well with thick shampoo or conditioner. I literally spent my whole shower time this morning pumping the dispenser to get my conditioner out, and it still would come out, and my conditioner isn't even that thick! So I don't think this is a good dispenser if you have thick products or even a slightly thick products. It did come out easier with my dr. Bronner Castile soap, but anything thicker than that will require much longer time to get it out. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nika Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wall mounted holder for shampoo, conditioners etc.
customer_reviews.text: It does install easily if you just follow the mounting instructions. It is attached to a smooth tile wall which I first cleaned with alcohol to remove anything from the surface and used both the tape and glue provided. I also left it alone for 24 hours before putting the shampoo or conditioner on it and it is attached perfectly and has never come loose even though exposed to shower splash and spray every day I was woried about the fact it was made of plastic but it seems to be well made and strong. It is very convenient to use ans simple to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret your decision
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent! I have 3 kids who I love to death BUT cleaning their bathroom was a nightmare. Little to no mess and so much easier for my 3 year old who is learning to be independent in the shower. Beyond pleased with this product and was super easy to assemble. Only issue I do have is the thickness of the liquid you are loading into the dispenser. Shampoo and body wash work perfect but the type of conditioner that we use will not dispense at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product-life changing for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for me because I have arthritis in my hands which makes it difficult to open various shampoo, conditioner and bath products especially in large bottles in my shower. The assembly and installation on shower wall was a breeze. The chambers lift out for refilling and cleaning- I've not had to refill them yet- they help conserve products! The only negative I can say is that it took some effort to prime the pumps- but since they are primed they work perfectly. I use Redkin and other thick products -and it works fine - like I said in the headline this product has changed my life for the better!-Wish I had gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for thr kids bathroom. I thought this would be a good solution to keep.them from wasting shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. I like the little hooks it has for their loofas. I made sure to clean the surface before hanging it. I also didn't hang the canister or the shower till 24 hours after I applied the glue. My son still manages to take the canisters off though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy product, great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: 3 days of Use and so far so good. Used the 3M tape to hold backing on while using all of the supplied silicone adhesive (All of It), I waited the alloted 24hrs for complete adhesion and then 1st tried the 3 containers on mount... they held, then slowy added the liquids into each container and... still held, now 3 showers in and still holding firm. Direction for priming the units was super easy and took about 5 pumps (direction on how to do it are imprinted under each containers lid). I filled them up with cheap shampoo/conditioner/body wash just incase we had a fallout. All in all fair priced and great product, we are using as intended!
customer_reviews.author: E to the S

customer_reviews.title: Can’t dispense Conditioner, or anything with any thickness
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. While it’s streamline and looked good in the shower, it cannot dispense anything thicker than clear shampoo. I tried two different body washes and nothing...conditioner...negative. If you only wanted to use it for thin watery soaps like facial cleanser then you could chance it. I also did not use the silicone glue it came with. I had 3M tape I used instead and it held like hell on there lol. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: shaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, priming is required for thicker soaps
customer_reviews.text: Decent build, works as advertised. They're a little small so they won't hold an entire bottles worth. Also requires to prime everytime you refill with thicker soap as the pump isn't as strong as some other models I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Tishella

customer_reviews.title: Great until it decided to quit
customer_reviews.text: Was great when it was working. Easy to fill and easy to dispense. It kept my shower organized which I like. Bought this product in May and it has worked great until the other day, it just decided to give out. It dropped down and shattered completely in the shower. My Paul Mitchell shampoo and conditioner was not salvaged :( For the amount paid I would hope it would last over a year..
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: no more clutter
customer_reviews.text: its great NOT having clutter in the Shower. our shower was built in the 70's so space is a premium. between all my wife's soaps, and my 1, we had a full shower hanger and bottles littered around our feet. this got rid of all but her face wash. i shorted it a star because it cant handle any of the soaps raw. i had to dilute a little of each soap and run it through before it would pull more down. so far the refills have not needed any more water to prime it. would be nice to see future generations have a larger bore for thicker soaps.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! Great addition to showers to clean up the clutter of bottles. Was super easy to install but as I saw in other reviews ...ensure to use all the adhesive in the tube and you should be fine. The instructions were sufficient but you need to use a little common sense. Took a minute or so to get the pump to work. Used my finger and pressing the button to create the suction. Though it was cool it came with stickers for various languages. I stuck with the “shampoo” “conditioner” and “body wash” labels.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Convenient to have in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use the glue that came with this. I used command Velcro strips. Came loose a bit, push it back into place. No more problems. This works great! I love it has made it more convenient to shower.
customer_reviews.author: Chesse

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner one didn’t dispense
customer_reviews.text: I installed it just fine and primed them as in the instructions. The shampoo one works just fine but I have spent over an hour trying to get the conditioner one to dispense with no luck. I bought this to aid in teaching my daughter how to wash her hair and now I can’t use half of it. Please send me a new continent one that works
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Heibel

customer_reviews.title: The Better Living AVIVA Two Chamber Dispenser works well with one ...
customer_reviews.text: The Better Living AVIVA Two Chamber Dispenser works well with one rub - you must push that button many times to get enough product out of the unit to condition a teen age girl's long shoulder length hair. Also, the chamber space for teenagers is too small and could be increased by 50% so refilling can be done just once a week and not two or more times per week for one teenager. In addition, because of all the other comments about this dispenser falling off the shower wall - we took the next step and drilled into the tile to avoid any potential accidents where the adhesive might fail. Aloha!
customer_reviews.author: Masterep

customer_reviews.title: Great...until it almost landed on my 2-year-old.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product, right until it almost fell on top of our child while she was taking a bath. Seems to be an issue with the product itself, rather than the install, as all of the adhesive and double back tape are still on the wall of the tub. The pieces on the bottom of the tub are definitely broken though and cannot be reused. Could not find a means to directly contact Amazon about this, so only recourse is to warn people about the danger of one of these falling on here.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M. Bielby

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. One of the buttons wouldn't push in anymore on my old one so I replaced with this one. I like it because each dispenser is seperate. Holds alittle less then my old one but no big deal. I am having no trouble at all getting conditioner to run thru it. I also didn't use the glue. I used heavy duty tape. Holds 30lbs
customer_reviews.author: DanielleP

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and it saves a lot of space in the shower. The only issue I have with it is it dispenses a little bit of liquid at a time. I kind of wish it dispensed more than a tiny squirt at once and that one push would release a continuous stream until I stopped pushing it. Still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: aquarpisc

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this. The shampoo just dribbles out, and it takes a ton of pumps to produce anything. The conditioner chamber (when it chooses to work) is even worse. The set up feels cheap, and its over all been disappointing. Now I know why the good ones cost $70, its because they work, unlike this thing. This is also one of those purchases you're sort of stuck with. We didnt know how bad it was until we'd loaded it up with $60 of shampoo and conditioner. Now its either we lose the product if we return this unit, and we stick it out and have to scoop shampoo and conditioner out of it every day.
customer_reviews.author: R. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Easily bumped
customer_reviews.text: So we got this shower dispenser after our last one kept having failing pumps. It is great that you can take each individual one off by itself and clean it or refill it. The thing you have to be really careful with though is placement. the containers are only held in place by about 1/2" of plastic and if bumped from the bottom, they come off easily. One has already gotten knocked off twice, and the spigot at the bottom broken off. Luckily I could glue it back on. Also, not all razors fit on the notches in between the shampoo containers. They are to close to the top to allow for the shape of some better razors.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: We have a vacation rental house with 4 bathrooms and my residence has 2 bathrooms so I bought 6. My husband was negative about them at first..but have not had ANY problems with them, they look very nice, keeps bottles out of the shower. They work great, easy to refill. I make sure to never let them lose prime but even if they did it's not hard to prime again. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Nash-Picotte

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because if you accidently push in and up on the unit it will fall off the wall and lid will come off and make a HUGE mess. It needs to have a special clasp or button to release it from from the main wall peice that holds it onto the wall. That way no matter which way you push on it, unless you push or turn a release button then it won't fall off the wall mounting peice.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Smith

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HANDLE THICK LIQUIDS
customer_reviews.text: This is great for shampoo and body gel, but no matter what I do I cannot get the conditioner to dispense. I've added at least 1/4 cup of water to the conditioner and it still will not be "primed" to dispense. I've tried priming the pump for 2 to 3 minutes straight and it WILL NOT DISPENSE. Very frustration, because I can't return it - it is very securely affixed to the wall. I have to dip- the conditioner out with an ice tea spoon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Won't Live Without Them
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Aviva Dispenser. We have owned the dual and triple dispenser for years and they still work beautifully. We found ourselves in need of a single dispenser and looked online for them at our local stores but they were no longer carrying this size. Once again, Amazon came to our rescue. One quick search and there they were making us very happy customers. We love the sleek design and the ease of use. So much nicer then mismatched bottles cluttering up the shower or tub area. The dispenser is easy to fill, they never drip and the top of the dispenser even holds a tube of my face cleanser. Debi B.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Debi B.

customer_reviews.title: Good if doesn't fall off your shower wall.
customer_reviews.text: Had them for about 2 months before they fell off the wall cracked and spilled all the soap over the floor. The plastic hooks on the back broke off so not like I can remount them. I paid $36 for them but looks like they are cheaper now. They worked pretty good while still on the wall but seems if you take longer than a 15 minute shower the steam may loosen the adhesive enough to make the whole unit fall. So really just depends if it sticks well for you or not.
customer_reviews.author: SmartBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit to the older white sets, if you need a replacement container or want to swap out the radio for another container.
customer_reviews.text: I received a set of these containers, as a gift, 10+ years ago, It came with 2 of them and a clock/radio in the middle. My husband killed the radio rather quickly, like he does to almost all electronics he touches. I purchased this as a replacement for that radio. You can't tell there was ever something different there, other than the replacement container. It's a perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: April Russo

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks, the frame detached from the wall, shattered the plastic hooks the dispensers attach through and spilled all of the body wash, shampoo and conditioner on the tub, wasting even more money. I followed the instructions to the T. Also note that it only ships with three of the 6 adhesive pads this would need. Cutting costs, I guess. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mervas

customer_reviews.title: How to prevent the dispenser from being knocked off its caddy
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I purchased kept getting knocked off no matter where I placed it with only a little bump until it broke beyond repair. When I purchased another one in March 2018 I looked for some way to secure it and discover that there was a small slot on the bottom, so I cut off the toothpick part off of a Plackers flosser and wedged it into the slot with needle nose pliers. Has not fallen yet, I think I would have to slam into it before there was any chance it would fall.
customer_reviews.author: john dragon

customer_reviews.title: The first set I installed in 2009 and they still look great. They don't collect hard water deposits and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these installed in different bathrooms. The first set I installed in 2009 and they still look great. They don't collect hard water deposits and they dry beautifully. I purchased more to replace some Simple Human dispensers that were AWFUL (water spots and the pull-lever was plastic and snapped in half) . If you're going to glue something to your wall - it should look great and function well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: A. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Read Instructions in LID on Priming Pump
customer_reviews.text: Love! However, use strong weight 3M strips to secure! ALSO, there are instructions in the lids telling you how to prime the pump (we thought our soap was too thick as described by some reviews)
customer_reviews.author: kjnmiss

customer_reviews.title: Love the way these dispensers look and work...
customer_reviews.text: ...however, I wish they were a little snugger in the tracks they slide into, and that the top didn't pop off so easily. I bought this product because we had a 3-way dispenser by this same maker for well over 15 years and found ourselves only needing a two-chamber dispenser. I'd rate it a 5, except for these two minor issues. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: RosaC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Be prepared to permanently install.
customer_reviews.text: The look of this thing is great. I think you have to be able to use the silicone "glue" that comes with it. I tried to use water-resistant command strips, but it feel within an hour after giving the strips over a day to "cure". I feel like the description should state that you have to be willing to permanently install this to keep it on the shower wall.
customer_reviews.author: lemongirl

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, and it the most comparatively priced on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be some cheap-o version of those found in hotels; I was wrong. It works well, looks nice, and it the most comparatively priced on Amazon. I love this thing but be warned, it takes a while for conditioner or thicker products to get pumped out at first. When they flow, they continuously flow well, but it takes a minute for thicker products to flow. If I could ask the manufacturer for anything it would be for a latch or some way the lids could not simply rest on top. They work well and I've never had an issue with them, but I don't have kids, so I suspect I am more careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin M. Elissetche

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied - 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 chamber model and absolutely love it. I’m not super confident in my skills to install anything without help and was able to accomplish installing this with no Issues by following the clear instructions. All 3 pumps work great and I plan to purchase a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson J

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought! Well made
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought. Each compartment would only hold half of a full size bottle. Other than that, it’s very well made an really easy to install. It comes with double sided tape, and we’ll as an adhesive. It’s also predrilled with screw mounting holes if you wanted to install on a wall for a shop or garage (great idea).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Decent so far.
customer_reviews.text: It's only been up a couple days but said it was super easy. The only thing I don't like is that it feels like cheap plastic I'm afraid that the first drop will result in a crack however I used to have the white set not sure if it's the same brand and it was almost impossible to fill up everything had to be removed etc etc this one you just gently lift the lid off with no force and put the shampoo and so so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: moreheadcity

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The item was easy to install and works great. Make sure you Read ALL the directions. Also make sure you know exactly where you want to place item. Once you apply the adhesive and stick it on the surface it is locked; no moving or adjusting. You must following priming instructions in order to create suction so liquids will come out when you push the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry White

customer_reviews.title: Installation issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, but have not been able to install yet. When package arrived, it only had 4 adhesive strips and small tube of glue. Instructions for the 3 dispenser, shows 6 areas to apply adhesive tapes. I called Better Living Products customer service and they will gladly send another set of adhesive strips, but it takes at least 2 weeks, coming from Canada. Ready to install but have to wait..... this is disappointing, but no choice now but to wait for their installation strips to arrive. I could get water proof commander strips from hardware store, but that might void the warranty. Just not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Its giving a beautiful look to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and one of its kind. Its giving a beautiful look to my bathroom. Ever since I installed it, no worries about soap running out as I can clearly see through and refill right in time. The body is made of simple plastic and do not expect it to be heavy duty metal except for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Anand P

customer_reviews.title: Small amount comes out each time
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install, my 14 year old daughter followed the directions (including letting it sit 24 hours before filling the dispensers. Works great for our shampoo, conditioner, and hanging two scrubby thingies. I didn’t think I’d like less product being dispensed each pump, but I do! The shampoo will last much longer since we don’t all need a huge amount of soap for our hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This has really freed up space in my shower and looks nice as well. I know several reviews stated it didn't stay attached. You must follow instructions to the letter. Clean, dry surface. Apply ALL the glue. I attached to the wall and left it alone for other 36 hours. (take a trip or use another bathroom). I then put in the filled containers and left it another 24 hours. I've been using it for other 3 months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great shower organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to declutter the shower and they did the job perfectly! The initial prime to get soap to dispense was kind of annoying, but not too much so that I wouldn’t recommend these! Fairly well built, easy to adhere to shower wall and seems to be stuck there for awhile!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: If you pay for the best you get the best
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these and they all work fantastic. I've never had any of my products leak nor have I ever had them fall of the wall. The inhesion is fantastic and they hold up very well. A little on the pricey side but I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Shower efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is not the first product I bought from this company and they all work great. I absolutely love the Look, and how easy to use them. I put four stars because of the poor design of locking mechanism, it just not there. So if you press on the button hard enough, slightly pushing it up at the same time, the whole canister will move up easy and the whole container with soap can just dropped in your top and shatter or crack. So just keep it in mind, but no matter what I will order another one if I need to one day. Definitely great product and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in a small bathroom that has little very little counter space. It has been in use since early summer and so far it is great--stays in place, refills easily, and works great with easy dispensing and no drips. We are using a liquid soap purchased from a well know buyers' club. This dispenser looks good too. It is ideal for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Kate

customer_reviews.title: The amount of liquid you get per pump is good. But when it comes to shampoo
customer_reviews.text: It's been too weeks since I got this product. It's still hanging in there. The product is smaller than it looks. The amount of liquid you get per pump is good. But when it comes to shampoo, people with long hair will have to pump for a while to get the sufficient amount. Update: 2 months later this pump is still going strong and shows no sign of letting up.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but they use clear labels.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these dispensers and have ordered several. I gave them an overall 4 stars because they changed the labels. They used to be white and they showed clearly what was in the dispensers. Now they are clear and you can barely see what is in the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphingirl

customer_reviews.title: I have a minimal bathroom now and I love it
customer_reviews.text: The installation process is easy. I like having minimalism in my bathroom, it makes everything look so clean. I bought this to make everything in the shower simple and quick. It has a beautiful design, easy to dispense and very firm. It is also really easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Shower Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers do a great job, and the amount of product remaining is easy to see. The only thing that I would change is the volume of product per pump cycle for the soap. I would double or triple the amount of soap dispensed per push.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Item is somewhat large on your bathroom wall. Mine did not work nothing comes out of the bottom. I would advise to put water in it and test first before you put it on your wall with SOAP in it. I am trying to get a replacement for it.
customer_reviews.author: patsfan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Followed directions so hopefully it will stay for a few years. I had to water down my conditioner a little so that it would dispense but it was not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Guery williamceau

customer_reviews.title: Working great after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these 4 years ago. Still working great. Had many other types that didn't last. One of my bottles shattered, my fault. The manufacturing sent me a replacement free of charge, knowing it was my fault. Great customer service. I have not used for conditioner as I've had bad luck in the past with other dispensers, it was too thick. But works great for shampoo and men's and ladies body wash in the three chamber.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my shower. My shower doesn't have a lot of places to put items but having this made my shower look a lot cleaner and put together. It has little hooks on it too so I was able to hang my razor and loofah I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Simply Ideal
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of the Simple Human line, and owned their dispenser at our old house. I was skeptical to try any other brand, but this one is great. The price was spot-on, easy to assemble and install. Just need to now use awhile and see how it holds up to daily use. If it does, I’ll be buying another one for our guest bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy and Tim Louisville, KY

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things neat and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and how easy it was to install. The only issues I have is that when the products get low, it won't dispense. The other is that I have to keep pushing the buttons in order to get the amount of product I need out. You can't hold and watch it pour.
customer_reviews.author: Billie R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and dispense
customer_reviews.text: Great item for bath or shower. Easy to install and fill and use. Each container is removable for easy refilling or rinsing. My hair conditioner is too think to dispense easily so I needed to dilute it considerably so it would come out easily. But I do not find this a problem.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaS

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my 5th wheel travel trailer shower!
customer_reviews.text: This was probably my most favorite purchase for our 5th wheel travel trailer. Each compartment is able to be removed separately, which allows for me to fill them up individually when they are low. This is nice looking, heavy duty but still light enough that it doesn’t fall off o the wall even when loaded up with product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality we expected
customer_reviews.text: Unit feel off of the shower wall within three months of installation. We took all the steps we could to make sure the mounting location was clean and free of any possible residue that might make the adhesive not hold but in spite of all the care taken the adhesive did not hold. Hit the tile floor in the water closet shower and busted into several pieces. Would not recommend this product unless you are willing to use an alternate adhesive to secure the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: William E Uthmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Guest Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT USE THE ADHESIVE OR GLUE that it came with. I used the 3M permanent mounting tape and put a ton a peices on it. It's in my guest bathroom which doesn't get used on a consistent basis by any means BUT it's still hanging with all 3 containers full. I think im going to buy one for my personal shower and see how the 3m tape works again. If not ill use what is provided and then write another review. Either way for the price and design I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neva

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service was great and sent a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these. One of the six pumps arrived broken. Amazon customer service was great and sent a replacement. I like these because each pump can be taken off the holder individually for cleaning and filling. I bought these to replace an older version of this product that had replaceable pumps, and I did replace a couple of the pumps in the older version over the years I had it. These seem to be make out of fairly brittle plastic and there is no way to replace the pump if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: A. See

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver, works excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works perfectly as advertised. Great space saver. Only negative is we had to buy more two-way tape because it didn't come with enough to put on all the areas we were supposed to (3 unit model). We did that it attached perfect and has worked perfect ever since.
customer_reviews.author: W. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this things I always buy it if i move to a different place and or recommend to everyone because i get lots of compliments when people see it and I recommend very sturdy and looks like part of my shower it really looks like it was part of the accessories of the shower love it
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nunez

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. I just wish I didn't have to push the dispense button like 4-5 times to get a decent amount of the product I've put in it. Still, it's sturdiness is above and beyond that of simple human.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Bee

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality, arrived with one of the back clips broken. I decided to glue it. Bodywash & shampoo come out when button is pushed. Conditioner does not come out. I wonder if they ever tested this product. I have to open the lid and scoop out the conditioner. What a waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: luv2nagg
